I don t believe in love.
I shop online , too much.
I write children s books.
I like to drink.

participant_2.background:
I am bald with a thick beard.
I enjoy comedies.
I work as an attorney.
I wear nice clothes.
I exercise often and have nice muscles.

content.text: I'm doing great, thanks for asking. How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks. I'm a writer, and I'm working on a children's book right now.
That's great! I love children's books. I'm an attorney, and I often use children's books in my work to help explain complex legal concepts to clients.
That's interesting. I've never thought about using children's books in that way.
It can be really helpful. Children's books are often very simple and easy to understand, and they can help clients to better understand complex legal concepts.
That makes sense. I'm glad to hear that children's books can be used for something other than entertainment.
Me too. They're a great resource for learning.
What kind of children's books do you write?
I write stories about animals, and I also write educational books about different topics.
That sounds really fun. I've always loved animals.
Me too. I think they're the best creatures on Earth.
I agree. They're so cute and cuddly.
They sure are. I'm glad we agree.
